data.message: My account was shut down for no apparent reason and I've sent my account credentials to open and return provided, I'm asking you to help me.

replies.message: Hi Togi Türkeş. We disable Facebook accounts that violate our terms. To see more about our securities and warnings please go to our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/18UkykU. If you think your account was disabled by mistake you can submit an appeal here: http://on.fb.me/18Uky4G -Natalie

Someone posted something inappropriate on a reply and I told them not to do it. I do not understand why I am being kept from sending messages to my friends? Who do I talk to about this situation? If you look you will see that Sam Medina sent me a message about someone being a lesbian, I don't want to hear that.
